31 #include "AutoRegistration.h"
32 #include "Errors.h"

34 #include "Transport.h"

36 #include "GSIRateLaw.h"

38 using namespace Eigen;
39 
40 using namespace Mutation::Utilities;
41 using namespace Mutation::Utilities::Config;
42 
43 namespace Mutation {
44  namespace GasSurfaceInteraction {
45 
46 class GSIRateLawGammaConst : public GSIRateLaw
47 {
48 public:
49  GSIRateLawGammaConst(ARGS args)
50  : GSIRateLaw (args),
51  mv_react(args.s_reactants)
52  {
53  assert(args.s_node_rate_law.tag() == "gamma_const");
54 
55  int l_diff_reac = 1;
56  for (int i_reac = 0; i_reac < mv_react.size() - 1; ++i_reac) {
57  if (mv_react[i_reac] != mv_react[i_reac + 1]) l_diff_reac++;
58  }
59 
60  std::vector<std::string> tokens;
61  String::tokenize(
62  args.s_node_rate_law.text(), tokens, ":, ");
63  int index_ref = -2;
64  for (int i = 0; i < tokens.size(); i+=2)
65  {
66  int index = m_thermo.speciesIndex(tokens[i]);
67  if(index_ref > index){
68  mv_gamma.insert(mv_gamma.begin(), atof(tokens[i+1].c_str()));
69  } else {
70  mv_gamma.insert(mv_gamma.end(), atof(tokens[i+1].c_str()));
71  }
72  index_ref = index;
73  }
74 
75  if (l_diff_reac != mv_gamma.size()) {
76  throw LogicError()
77  << "Number of gammas should be equal to the number of "
78  "different reactants.";
79  }
80 
81  m_idx_react = -1;
82  m_idx_sp = -1;
83  m_stoich_coef = -1;
84 
85  mv_imp_flux_out.resize(mv_gamma.size());
86  mv_imp_flux_per_stoich_coef.resize(mv_gamma.size());
87 
88  }
89 
90 //==============================================================================
91 
92  ~GSIRateLawGammaConst(){}
93 
94 //==============================================================================
95 
96  double forwardReactionRateCoefficient(
97  const VectorXd& v_rhoi, const VectorXd& v_Twall) const
98  {
99  m_idx_react = 0;
100  for(int i_g = 0; i_g < mv_gamma.size(); i_g++) {
101  getSpeciesIndexandStoichiometricCoefficient(
102  m_idx_react, m_idx_sp, m_stoich_coef);
103  mv_imp_flux_out[i_g] = computeSurfaceImpingingMassFlux(
104  m_idx_sp, v_rhoi, v_Twall);
105 
106  mv_imp_flux_per_stoich_coef[i_g] =
107  mv_imp_flux_out[i_g]/m_stoich_coef;
108  mv_imp_flux_out[i_g] =
109  mv_imp_flux_per_stoich_coef[i_g]*mv_gamma[i_g];
110 
111  m_idx_react += m_stoich_coef;
112  }
113 
114  return getLimitingImpingingMassFlux();
115  }
116 
117 private:
118  mutable int m_idx_react;
119  mutable int m_idx_sp;
120  mutable int m_stoich_coef;
121 
122  std::vector<double> mv_gamma;
123 
124  mutable std::vector<double> mv_imp_flux_out;
125  mutable std::vector<double> mv_imp_flux_per_stoich_coef;
126 
127  const std::vector<int>& mv_react;
128 
129 //==============================================================================
130 private:
134  inline void getSpeciesIndexandStoichiometricCoefficient(
135  int idx_react, int& idx_sp, int& stoich_coef) const
136  {
137  idx_sp = mv_react[idx_react];
138  stoich_coef = 1;
139  idx_react++;
140 
141  while(idx_react < mv_react.size()) {
142  if (idx_sp != mv_react[idx_react]) {
143  break;
144  }
145  stoich_coef++;
146  idx_react++;
147  }
148  }
149 
150 //==============================================================================
154  inline double computeSurfaceImpingingMassFlux(
155  const int& idx_sp,
156  const VectorXd& v_rhoi,
157  const VectorXd& v_Twall) const
158  {
159  const int set_state_with_rhoi_T = 1;
160  m_thermo.setState(
161  v_rhoi.data(), v_Twall.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
162  double m_sp_thermal_speed = m_transport.speciesThermalSpeed(idx_sp);
163 
164  return m_sp_thermal_speed / 4.
165  * v_rhoi(idx_sp) / m_thermo.speciesMw(idx_sp);
166  }
167 
168 //==============================================================================
173  inline double getLimitingImpingingMassFlux() const
174  {
175  return mv_imp_flux_out[min_element(
176  mv_imp_flux_per_stoich_coef.begin(),
177  mv_imp_flux_per_stoich_coef.end()) -
178  mv_imp_flux_per_stoich_coef.begin()];
179  }
180 };
181 
182 ObjectProvider<
183  GSIRateLawGammaConst, GSIRateLaw>
184  gsi_rate_law_gamma_const("gamma_const");
185 
186  } // namespace GasSurfaceInteraction
187 } // namespace Mutation
